name: <%= _.slugify(appname)%>
description: <%= _.slugify(appname)%>, a component for the React framework.

scripts.build: npm dedupe && node_modules/.bin/collect-statics ./ && mkdir -p ./test/build/statics && cp -r node_modules/statics/* ./test/build/statics/ && cat ./test/build/statics/*.css > ./test/build/statics/_all.css && browserify src/index.jsx > test/build/_all.js -t reactify -t envify
